column4: hi there! i have a problem with a qmail installation on a ubuntu 7.10 box ... http://pastebin.com/m5f306463 can anyone tell me if is a dependency/ build error caused by ubuntu ?
i heard that qmail needs some patches to build onl latest distributions. There are several qmail dist with the patches added
i know that ubuntu don't have qmail in repo ... and their site don't contain a how to for ubuntu ... also .. their web is down
